meanings.definition: The language or jargon used by geeks or enthusiasts in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: In the world of computers, understanding geekspeaks is essential for effective communication.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to decipher the geekspeaks of the gaming community.
meanings.sent3: When the IT team started talking in geekspeaks, everyone else felt lost.
meanings.sent4: To the untrained ear, geekspeaks may sound like a foreign language.
meanings.sent5: Learning geekspeaks is like unlocking a secret code to a whole new world.

meanings.definition: To communicate in a technical or specialized manner, often using terminology specific to a certain subject.
meanings.sent1: The engineer geekspeaks with precision to convey complex ideas.
meanings.sent2: He geekspeaks fluently when discussing programming languages.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, he geekspeaks so intensely that even the experts nod in agreement.
meanings.sent4: She geekspeaks in a way that paints a vivid picture of the technology landscape.
meanings.sent5: Geekspeaking about robotics, he brings life to the mechanical world.
